title: 164 - OOP Design in Rails with TJ Stankus
content:
Code with Jason is back! On this episode, TJ Stankus returns for a discussion of Object Oriented Programming and his book 99 Bottles of OOP.Â  We also discuss managing large applications with Rails, models, organizing by domain concept, and microservices.

  • 99 Bottles of OOP by Sandi Metz, Katrina Owen, and TJ Stankus
  • Responsibility-Driven Design by Rebecca Wirfs-Brock
  • Design Stamina Hypothesis by Martin Fowler
  • The Magic of Reality by Richard Dawkins
  • Domain Driven Design by Eric Evans
  • Why I Organize my Tests by Domain Concept, not by Test Type by Jason Swett
